snippet: Brooklyn’s Denise Starr trains year-round at the Billie Jean King National Tennis Center, but in the early part of the United States Open the 17-year-old is relegated to the far practice courts.
abstract: Profile of Denise Starr, 17-year-old Brooklyn native who trains year-round at the Billie Jean King National Tennis Center in Queens; she is fighting for a spot in the girls' junior open field at the United States Open.
lead_paragraph: Brooklyn’s Denise Starr trains year-round at the Billie Jean King National Tennis Center, but in the early part of the United States Open the 17-year-old is relegated to the far practice courts.

headline.seo: Brooklyn’s Denise Starr Is Trying to Qualify for the Girls’ Junior Open
headline.main: Far From Action but Right at Home
headline.print_headline: Far From Action But Right at Home
